tracksy.title: Tracksy
tracksy.description: Freelancers lose 3-5h/week tracking hours and generating invoices. Tracksy automates the entire cycle: time tracking → invoice generation → accounting export.

features.system: System: Time tracking → invoices → automated accounting export

memocall.title: MemoCall
memocall.description: SMBs lose critical information after every client call. MemoCall transcribes, summarizes, extracts actions and pre-fills documents automatically.

features.problem: Problem: Lost info and manual entry after every call
features.system: System: Transcription → summary → to-do → pre-filled docs
features.impact: Impact: 0 manual note-taking, 100% of info captured

coresync.title: CoreSync
coresync.description: Teams waste time searching for documentation and internal processes. CoreSync centralizes everything with an AI agent that responds instantly.

features.problem: Problem: Time wasted searching for docs and internal processes
features.system: System: AI agent that queries your knowledge base

sidequest.title: SideQuest
sidequest.description: Organizing outings with friends = chaos of messages and indecision. SideQuest centralizes events, favorites and personalized recommendations.

features.system: System: Events by category + "For You" recommendations
features.impact: Impact: iOS app in public beta
